trans-unit.source: Supplies location data that is based on latitude and longitude coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Utstyr posisjonsdataene som er basert på breddegrad og lengdegrad koordinater.

trans-unit.source: The GeoCoordinateWatcher class supplies coordinate-based location data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: Klassen GeoCoordinateWatcher leverer koordinaten kodebasert posisjonsdataene fra gjeldende plassering-leverandør.

trans-unit.source: The current location provider is prioritized as the highest on the computer, based on a number of factors, such as the age and accuracy of the data from all providers, the accuracy requested by location applications, and the power consumption and performance impact associated with the location provider.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende plassering leverandør prioriteres høyeste på datamaskinen, basert på flere faktorer, for eksempel alder og nøyaktigheten av data fra alle leverandører nøyaktigheten ble forespurt av plassering programmer og power forbruk og ytelse innvirkning knyttet til leverandøren plassering.

trans-unit.source: The current location provider might change over time, for instance, when a GPS device loses its satellite signal indoors and a Wi-Fi triangulation provider becomes the most accurate provider on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende plassering leverandør kan endres over tid, for eksempel når en enhet GPS mister det satellitt signalet inne og Wi-Fi triangulering leverandør blir mest nøyaktige leverandøren på datamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: To begin accessing location data, create a GeoCoordinateWatcher and call <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> or <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.TryStart%2A> to initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: For å få tilgang til posisjonsdataene, kan du opprette en GeoCoordinateWatcher og kall <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A>eller <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.TryStart%2A>til å starte henting av data fra gjeldende plassering-leverandør.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.TryStart%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property can be checked to determine if data is available.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>egenskapen kan kontrolleres å finne ut om data er tilgjengelig.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>

trans-unit.source: If data is available, you can get the location one time from the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> property, or receive continuous location updates by handling the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis data er tilgjengelig, kan du hente plasseringen én gang fra den <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>egenskapen eller motta kontinuerlige plassering oppdateringer ved behandling av <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> properties support <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>, so that an application can data-bind to these properties.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>, og <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>Egenskaper støtte <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>, slik at et program kan-databinding til disse egenskapene.</xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A>

trans-unit.source: In Windows 7, all the <xref:System.Device.Location> classes are fully functional if a location provider is installed and able to resolve the computer's location.
trans-unit.target: I Windows 7 alle de <xref:System.Device.Location>klasser er fullstendig funksjonelt Hvis et plassering-leverandøren er installert og kan ikke løse datamaskinens plassering.</xref:System.Device.Location>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On Windows 7 Starter Edition, the only supported location provider is the Default Location Provider in Control Panel, and an add-in must be installed to specify latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > På Windows 7 Starter Edition bare støttet plassering-leverandør er som standard plassering leverandøren i Kontrollpanel og et tillegg må installeres for å angi breddegrad og lengdegrad.

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.
trans-unit.target: **Obs** i versjoner av Windows før Windows 7, gjelder følgende: – alle <xref:System.Device.Location>objekter som har konstruktører kan opprettes, men <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>har alltid verdi <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location>

trans-unit.source: - The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: -Plasseringen angitt av <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>vil alltid være <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: - No location events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: – Ingen plassering hendelser vil være starter.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref> with default accuracy settings.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref> med nøyaktigheten standardinnstillinger.

trans-unit.source: The default accuracy setting is <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy>.
trans-unit.target: Nøyaktighet standardinnstillingen er <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy>

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.
trans-unit.target: **Obs** i versjoner av Windows før Windows 7, gjelder følgende: – alle <xref:System.Device.Location>objekter som har konstruktører kan opprettes, men <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>har alltid verdi <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location>

trans-unit.source: - The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: -Plasseringen angitt av <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>vil alltid være <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: - No location events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: – Ingen plassering hendelser vil være starter.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref>, given an accuracy level.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref>, angitt et nøyaktigheten-nivå.

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.
trans-unit.target: **Obs** i versjoner av Windows før Windows 7, gjelder følgende: – alle <xref:System.Device.Location>objekter som har konstruktører kan opprettes, men <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>har alltid verdi <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location>

trans-unit.source: - The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: -Plasseringen angitt av <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>vil alltid være <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: - No location events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: – Ingen plassering hendelser vil være starter.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationAccuracy> that indicates the requested accuracy level of the location provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationAccuracy>som angir det forespurte nøyaktigheten av leverandøren plassering.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationAccuracy>

trans-unit.source: An accuracy of <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy"></xref> can degrade performance and should be specified only when high accuracy is needed.
trans-unit.target: En nøyaktighet på <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy"> </xref> kan redusere ytelsen og kan angis bare når høy nøyaktigheten kreves.

trans-unit.source: The requested accuracy level for the location data that is provided by the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det forespurte nøyaktighet-nivået for posisjonsdataene som er angitt av den <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An accuracy of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy> can degrade performance and should be specified only when high accuracy is needed.
trans-unit.target: En nøyaktighet på <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy>kan redusere ytelsen og kan angis bare når høy nøyaktigheten er nødvendig.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy>

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.
trans-unit.target: **Obs** i versjoner av Windows før Windows 7, gjelder følgende: – alle <xref:System.Device.Location>objekter som har konstruktører kan opprettes, men <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>har alltid verdi <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location>

trans-unit.source: - The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: -Plasseringen angitt av <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>vil alltid være <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: - No location events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: – Ingen plassering hendelser vil være starter.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy"></xref>, which indicates the requested accuracy level of the location provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy"></xref>, som angir det forespurte nøyaktigheten plassering-leverandør.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources that are used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressurser som brukes av den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> class?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
trans-unit.target: Kall <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A>Når du er ferdig med den <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher>klassen? qualifyHint = False & autoUpgrade = True.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method should be called so that unmanaged resources can be freed.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden må kalles slik at uforvaltede ressurser kan være frigis.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> class?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
trans-unit.target: Kall <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A>Når du er ferdig med den <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher>klassen? qualifyHint = False & autoUpgrade = True.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method should be called so that unmanaged resources can be freed.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden må kalles slik at uforvaltede ressurser kan være frigis.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Frees resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Frigjør ressurser og til å utføre andre operasjoner for opprydding før den <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref> gode av datasanering.

trans-unit.source: The distance that must be moved, in meters, relative to the coordinate from the last <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"></xref> event, before the location provider raises another <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Avstanden må være flyttet, i meter i forhold til koordinaten fra siste <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"> </xref> hendelsen før plassering leverandøren opphøyer et annet <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The default movement threshold is zero, which means that any change in location detected by the current location provider causes a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> event and an update in the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Standard flytting terskelen er null, noe som betyr at noen endrer på plasseringen som er registrert ved gjeldende plassering leverandøren årsaker en <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>hendelsen og en oppdatering av <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The movement threshold does not guarantee that events will be received at the requested threshold.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Flytting terskelen ikke garantere at hendelser mottas ved den forespurte.

trans-unit.source: The platform attempts to honor requests for a particular movement threshold, but in some cases, the events will not be raised at the requested threshold.
trans-unit.target: Plattformen prøver å overholde forespørsler for en bestemt flytting terskel, men i enkelte tilfeller hendelser blir ikke oppstå ved den forespurte.

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.
trans-unit.target: **Obs** i versjoner av Windows før Windows 7, gjelder følgende: – alle <xref:System.Device.Location>objekter som har konstruktører kan opprettes, men <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>har alltid verdi <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location>

trans-unit.source: - The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: -Plasseringen angitt av <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>vil alltid være <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: - No location events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: – Ingen plassering hendelser vil være starter.

trans-unit.source: The following diagram represents location coordinates that the location provider (for example, a GPS device) supplies to the computer.
trans-unit.target: Diagrammet nedenfor representerer plassering koordinater som plassering leverandøren (for eksempel en GPS enhet) leverer til datamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: P1, in the diagram, represents the location data included in a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> event, and P2, P3, and P4 represent points within the movement threshold.
trans-unit.target: P1, i diagrammet representerer posisjonsdataene som er inkludert i en <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>hendelse, og P2, P3 og P4 representerer punkt i terskelen flytting.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>

trans-unit.source: So when the location provider supplies data indicating a location at those points (P1, P2, P3, and P4), no <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> events are raised, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> returns P1.
trans-unit.target: Så når plasseringen leverandøren leverer data som ikke angir en plassering på disse tidspunkter (P1 P2, P3 og P4), <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>hendelser registreres, og <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>returnerer P1.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The point P5 is outside of the MovementThreshold distance, so at that point, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationProvider.Location%2A> is updated and a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationProvider.LocationChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Punkt-P5 er utenfor MovementThreshold-avstanden så på det tidspunktet <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationProvider.Location%2A>er oppdatert, og en <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationProvider.LocationChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationProvider.LocationChanged> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationProvider.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram illustrating MovementThreshold](~/add/media/ndp-movementthreshold.png "Diagram illustrating MovementThreshold")
trans-unit.target: ![Diagrammet illustrerer MovementThreshold](~/add/media/ndp-movementthreshold.png "Diagram illustrerer MovementThreshold")

trans-unit.source: Distance, in meters.
trans-unit.target: Avstanden i meter.

trans-unit.source: Called when a <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når en <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"> </xref> inntreffer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionChangedEventArgs%601> object that contains the new location.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionChangedEventArgs%601> objekt som inneholder den nye plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: Called when a <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.StatusChanged"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når en <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.StatusChanged"> </xref> inntreffer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatusChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the new status.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatusChangedEventArgs"> </xref> objekt som inneholder den nye statusen.

trans-unit.source: Called when a property of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når en egenskap for den <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref> endringer.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged> event to implement data binding in Windows Forms applications.
trans-unit.target: Behandle den <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged>-hendelsen for å implementere databinding Windows Forms-programmer.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged>

trans-unit.source: This method indicates that the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property, the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> property, or the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden, betyr det at det <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>egenskapen den <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>egenskapen eller <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A>-egenskapen er endret.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property that has changed.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på egenskapen som er endret.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether permission to access location data from location providers has been granted or denied.
trans-unit.target: Angir om tilgang til posisjonsdataene fra plasseringen leverandører har gitt eller nektet.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether permission has been granted or denied.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir om tilgang har gitt eller nektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> which indicates the current location.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> som angir den gjeldende plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> which indicates the current location.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> som angir den gjeldende plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the latitude or longitude of the location data has changed.
trans-unit.target: Angir at breddegraden eller lengdegraden til posisjonsdataene er endret.

trans-unit.source: This event is only raised when the distance moved since the last event exceeds the threshold that is specified by <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.MovementThreshold%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår bare når avstanden flyttes fordi den siste hendelsen overskrider terskelen som er angitt av <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.MovementThreshold%2A>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.MovementThreshold%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionChangedEventArgs%601> object passed to the event handler includes the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601> object that contains the updated location data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionChangedEventArgs%601>objektet som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen inneholder den <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601>objekt som inneholder den oppdaterte posisjonsdataene.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionChangedEventArgs%601>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: Starte henting av data fra gjeldende plassering-leverandør.

trans-unit.source: This method enables <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"></xref> events and allows access to the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden aktiverer <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"> </xref> hendelser og tillater tilgang til den <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method will initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden vil starte henting av data fra gjeldende plassering-leverandør.

trans-unit.source: The current location provider is selected based on factors such as the age and accuracy of the data from all providers, the accuracy requested by the application or applications, and the power consumption and performance impact associated with the location provider.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende plassering leverandør velges basert på faktorer som alder og nøyaktigheten av data fra alle leverandører, nøyaktighet som ble forespurt av programmet eller programmer og power forbruket og innvirkning på ytelsen knyttet til leverandøren plassering.

trans-unit.source: The current location provider might change over time, for instance, when a GPS device loses its satellite signal indoors and a Wi-Fi triangulation provider becomes the most accurate provider on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende plassering leverandør kan endres over tid, for eksempel når en enhet GPS mister det satellitt signalet inne og Wi-Fi triangulering leverandør blir mest nøyaktige leverandøren på datamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: If the current prioritized location provider does not have data when the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> method is called, it will start to acquire data.
trans-unit.target: Hvis gjeldende prioriteres plassering leverandøren ikke har data når den <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A>-metoden, den vil begynne å hente data.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the permissions have been granted to the client when the data becomes available, data can be accessed synchronously, and will be delivered asynchronously if events are being handled.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tillatelsene som er gitt til klienten når dataene er tilgjengelig, kan få tilgang til synkron data og leveres asynkront Hvis hendelser behandles.

trans-unit.source: If the Windows 7 Sensor and Location platform is disabled when <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> is called, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> will immediately return, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> events will not be raised, and the location returned by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will contain <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Windows 7 sensoren og plassering plattformen deaktiveres når <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A>kalles, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A>umiddelbart returnere, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>ikke vil feilbehandlingen hendelser, og plasseringen som returneres av <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>inneholder <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the current prioritized location provider does have data, it will be available synchronously immediately, and will be delivered asynchronously if events are being handled.
trans-unit.target: Hvis gjeldende prioritert plassering leverandør har data, blir tilgjengelig synkront umiddelbart og vil bli levert asynkront Hvis hendelser behandles.

trans-unit.source: If the calling application does not have permissions to access data from a location provider, the user will be prompted with a dialog box to either grant or deny permission.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet som kaller ikke har tilgang til data fra en plassering-leverandør, blir brukeren bedt om en dialogboks for å gi eller avslå tilgang.

trans-unit.source: The dialog box will be modeless.
trans-unit.target: Dialogboksen blir ikke-modale.

trans-unit.source: Initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: Starte henting av data fra gjeldende plassering-leverandør.

trans-unit.source: This method enables <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"></xref> events and allows access to the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden aktiverer <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"> </xref> hendelser og tillater tilgang til den <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to suppress the permission dialog box; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to optionally show the permission dialog box if permissions have not already been granted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>undertrykke dialogboksen tillatelse. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> å vise eventuelt dialogboksen tillatelse hvis tillatelser ikke som allerede er gitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current status of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende status for den <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus"></xref> which indicates the availability of data from the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus"> </xref> som angir tilgjengeligheten av data fra den <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the status of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref> object has changed.
trans-unit.target: Angir at statusen for den <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref> objektet er endret.

trans-unit.source: The StatusChanged event is raised on the same thread that the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> object was created on.
trans-unit.target: StatusChanged denne hendelsen oppstår i samme tråd som den <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher>objektet ble opprettet på.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Stops the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref> from providing location data and events.
trans-unit.target: Stopper det <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref> tilby posisjonsdataene og hendelser.

trans-unit.source: After Stop is called, no further <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> events occur, and the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> property will return <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: Når Stopp ikke kalles, mer <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>hendelser inntreffer, og <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>egenskapen tilbakestiller <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>

trans-unit.source: When Stop is called, the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationStatus.Disabled>.
trans-unit.target: Når Stopp kalles, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationStatus.Disabled>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationStatus.Disabled> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initiates the acquisition of data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: Starter henting av data fra gjeldende plassering-leverandør.

trans-unit.source: This method returns synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer synkront.

trans-unit.source: This method blocks execution of the calling thread during the time period specified by `timeout`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden blokkerer kjøring av kall tråden under tidsperioden angitt av `timeout`.

trans-unit.source: Use caution when calling TryStart from the user interface thread of your application.
trans-unit.target: Vær forsiktig når du kaller TryStart fra brukeren grensesnittet tråd for programmet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to suppress the permission dialog box; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to display the permission dialog box.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>undertrykke dialogboksen tillatelse. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> til å vise dialogboksen tillatelse.

trans-unit.source: Time in milliseconds to wait for the location provider to start before timing out.
trans-unit.target: Tid i millisekunder det skal ventes for plassering-leverandøren å starte før tidsavbrudd.

trans-unit.source: if data acquisition is started within the time period specified by timeout; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis datahenting startes innen tidsperioden som er angitt av timeout ; ellers .
